      public String addContinent(int p_continentId, int p_controlValue)
      This method is used to add a continent to the map
      Parameters:
      p_continentId - Id of continent
      p_controlValue - Control value of continent
      Returns:
      True response if continent added successfully

      Parameters:
      p_continentId - Continent id to be removed
      Returns:
      True response if continent removed successfully

    • loadMap

      public String loadMap(String p_fileName)
      This method is used to load a map from a file
      Parameters:
      p_fileName - Name of a .map file
      Returns:
      False response if map file is failed to load successfully, returns True otherwise.

    • showMapEdit

      public String showMapEdit()
      The method shows the map file in edit phase with proper formatting.
      Returns:
      l_final_data represents table containing data in string format

    • showMapPlay

      public String showMapPlay()
      The method shows the map file in gameplay phase with proper formatting. It prints String of Countries, Continent, Owner, Armies present, Corresponding Neighbors
      Returns:
      l_final_data Table containing data in string format

    • fillCountryData

      public String[] fillCountryData(Country p_country, boolean p_isEdit)
      The method fills the data of a specific country
      Parameters:
      p_country - country for which data is to be present
      p_isEdit - false if showMap called in gameplay phase, true if called in edit phase
      Returns:
      Country returns data in array format

      Returns:
